Package metrics.perclass

Class AbstractAuxiliaryScores

java.lang.Object
metrics.perclass.AbstractAuxiliaryScores
All Implemented Interfaces:
SingleScore
Direct Known Subclasses:
F1PerClass, FNPerClass, FPPerClass, SensitivityPerClass, SpecificityPerClass, TNPerClass, TPPerClass
public abstract class AbstractAuxiliaryScores
extends java.lang.Object
implements SingleScore
This is an abstract class implements the SingleScore interface and it is a blueprint for the calculation of scores for invidual classes given a confusion matrix( a matrix of int - int[][]).
Since:
2020-05-03
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Marcelo Jacinto, David Souto, Gonçalo Tomás
See Also:
SingleScore

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AbstractAuxiliaryScores​(int[][] confusionMatrix)
    Constructor for the AbstractAuxiliaryScores class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected abstract double doCalculateScore​(int i)
    An abstract method to be implemented a posteriori that receives the index of the class in the matrix to calculate the score from and returns a double with a score for that particular class
    protected int[][] getConfusionMatrix()
    A method that returns a matrix of int (int[][]) with the confusion matrix used to calculate the scores
    double getScore​(int i)
    A method to allow the user to get the calculated score for a particular class.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractAuxiliaryScores

      public AbstractAuxiliaryScores​(int[][] confusionMatrix)
      Constructor for the AbstractAuxiliaryScores class. It receives a confusion matrix as argument (int[][])
      Parameters:
      confusionMatrix - A matrix of int (int[][]) that represents a confusion matrix with the lines representing the predictions and the column representing the real classifications

  • Method Details

    • doCalculateScore

      protected abstract double doCalculateScore​(int i)
      An abstract method to be implemented a posteriori that receives the index of the class in the matrix to calculate the score from and returns a double with a score for that particular class
      Parameters:
      i - An int with the index (in the matrix) to calculate the score
      Returns:
      A double with the score for the individual class

    • getScore

      public double getScore​(int i)
      A method to allow the user to get the calculated score for a particular class. This method invokes the doCalculateScore method inside.
      Specified by:
      getScore in interface SingleScore
      Parameters:
      i - An int with the index (in the matrix) to calculate the score
      Returns:
      A double with the score for the individual class

    • getConfusionMatrix

      protected int[][] getConfusionMatrix()
      A method that returns a matrix of int (int[][]) with the confusion matrix used to calculate the scores
      Returns:
      A matrix of int (int[][]) - the confusion matrix used to calculate the scores
